column4: why are there only two versions of Ubuntu...ever?  like we only have 9.04 or 9.10.  10.04 or 10.10.  Why?
ah, okay.  so how long is the *.10 version good for?
Please take a look at the following link, as we have more than just 2 releases of Ubuntu currently supported: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Releases
